publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1059 Margo MacDonald: Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place"-That the Parliament agrees, in the public interest, and with a view to helping the Holyrood Inquiry, that parliamentary employees and MSPs who contributed interviews or information for The Gathering Place should be encouraged to release the programme's producers from any undertaking of confidentiality given by them to contributors in advance of the programme's transmission.
S2M-1059 Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Dennis Canavan*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1059 Margo MacDonald: Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place"-That the Parliament agrees, in the public interest, and with a view to helping the Holyrood Inquiry, that parliamentary employees and MSPs who contributed interviews or information for The Gathering Place should be encouraged to release the programme's producers from any undertaking of confidentiality given by them to contributors in advance of the programme's transmission. Supported by: Dennis Canavan, Ms Sandra White
S2M-1059 Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1059 Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Christine Grahame*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1059 Holyrood Inquiry - "The Gathering Place" (lodged on 17 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
